analysis.key_quote: Reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F employees would politicize the NIH, reduce public trust in Federally-funded science.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of the NIH and its negative impact on public trust in science, which aligns with the themes of politicization and scientific integrity.
